projects.title: Meditate for Peace!
projects.description: Open mind and clear focus for inner peace. Train your brain to experience the present without regretting the past or fearing the future.

projects.title: Music for happiness!
projects.description: Music holds the power to transform your state of mind. The lyrics relate to your experiences, improves mood with amplified 'Happy Hormone' production.

projects.title: Healthy Body
projects.description: Tackling challenges of the world just like lifting barbells. Challenges don't increase heart rate anymore the way intense workout does.

projects.title: Healthy Mind
projects.description: Improve communication and learning, attention and memory. Forget stress for light-hearted focus and joy.
